description:
odbc: handle empty VARCHAR columns

Fixes issue 7.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: lukemauldin@gmail.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/odbc

On 2013/05/02 07:25:51, brainman wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:lukemauldin@gmail.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/odbc

I made this exact same code change in my repository yesterday and tested it all day and it appeared to be working correctly.  I was holding off on submitting it because of the multiple CL at the same time issue that I didn't know how to resolve.  Regardless, this looks good to me.

On 2013/05/02 11:53:07, lukemauldin wrote:
> ...  Regardless, this looks good to me.

You want LGTM (magical word recognized by codereview) instead.

Described in http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#tmp_14.

Alex

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/odbc/source/detail?r=775d8f76e92c ***

odbc: handle empty VARCHAR columns

Fixes issue 7.

R=golang-dev, lukemauldin
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9072044

subject: code review 9072044: odbc: handle empty VARCHAR columns
